entry.title: Sunbutter (For Face + Body)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Sunscreen
Price: 36.00

A lovely, sheer UV blocking moisturizer packed with B Vitamins to protect your skin, keeping it radiant + youthful.

• 4 fl oz / 118 ml

Ingredients

Aloe barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Juice, Cocos nucifera (Organic Coconut) Oil, Emulsifying Wax, Palm Stearic Acid, Vegetable Glycerin, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Persea americana (Avocado) Oil, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Phenoxyethanol, Shea Butter (Naturally Refined), Mangifera indica (Mango) Butter, Para-Aminobenzoic Acid (PABA), Zinc Oxide, Titanium Dioxide, Xanthan Gum (Polysaccharide Gum), Salix alba (Willow Bark) Extract, Azadirachta indica (Neem) Oil, Rosmarinus officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, (May contain sodium bicarbonate and/or citric acid as pH adjusters)E

Directions

Use this UV blocking moisturizer all over face and body. Reapply every two hours or as necessary.

entry.title: Pumpkin Enzyme Masque
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Facial Mask
Price: 42.00

The Pumpkin Enzyme Masque is rich in natural antioxidants, enzymes and over 100 beneficial nutrients, which increase the rate of cell renewal, transforming dull complexions to bright and healthy skin. Comparable to the effects of alpha hydroxy acids, this organic face masque rejuvenates skin while preserving its natural protective mantle.

• 4 fl oz / 118 ml

Ingredients

Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Fruit, Aqua (Deionized Water), Vaccinium Myrtillus (Organic Bilberry) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Organic Sugar Cane) Extract, Acer Saccharinum (Organic Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Organic Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Organic Lemon) Peel Extract, Glycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Phenoxyethanol, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Glycolic Acid, Azadirachta Indica (Neem) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officnalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum (Cinnamon) Bark Powder, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Powder, Pimenta Officinalis (Allspice) Powder, Myristica Fragrans (Nutmeg) Powder, (May contain sodium bicarbonate and/or citric acid as pH adjusters).

Directions

Apply a thin layer to cleansed skin, avoiding eyes. Rinse off after 5 to 10 minutes. Tingling may occur.

entry.title: Chamomile + Cucumber Eye Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Eye Serum
Price: 24.00

Chamomile and cold-pressed Cucumber soothe the skin while brightening, hydrating and reducing puffiness. Shamanuti's Eye Gel uses the synergistic effects of anti-inflammatory Chamomile and decongesting Cucumber to calm the sensitive eye area as well as diminish dark circles and awaken the eyes.

• 1 fl oz / 30 ml

Ingredients

Aloe barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Juice, Vegetable Glycerin, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel), Gluconolactone, Cranberry Seed Oil (CP), Cucumber Distillate, Chamomile Distillate, Carbomer, Triethanolamine (TEA), Sodium Benzoate

Directions

Dab a small amount lightly around the orbital bone (the outer rim of eye socket) to calm, cool, hydrate and reduce puffiness.

entry.title: Crème No.1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Face Cream
Price: 48.00

This beloved creme works to balance color imperfections and shine while working on a cellular level to stimulate cell repair. It has a high percentage of silk peptides which, when encapsulated into the layers of the skin, create stronger, firmer + clearer skin. The proprietary seaweed complex in Crème No. 1 is a healing agent for scars, fine lines and wrinkles. Crème No. 1 is ideal for all skin types.

• 1 fl oz / 30 ml

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Leaf Juice, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Distillate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Organic Shea) Butter, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Extract, Theobroma Cacoa (Cocoa) Butter, Emulsifying Wax NF, Persae Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glycerin, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Silk, Fucus Vesiculosus (Organic Sea Weed) Extract, Hammamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Garcinia Indica (Kokum0 Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Stearic Acid, Xanthan gum, Citrus Aurantium (Neroli) Essential Oil

Directions

Moisturize your face and neck every day in upward motions.

entry.title: Seaweed Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Facial Toner
Price: 10.00 - 28.00 (2 variants)

Your skin will love this delicious, nutrient and mineral-rich toner! It adjusts pH and refines the pores, and will nourish + hydrate the skin while removing any residual make-up or cleanser.

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Leaf Juice, Ascophyllum Nodosum (Organic Kelp) Extract, Aphanizomenon Flos-Aquae (Organic Blue Green Algae) Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Glucolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Salix Alba (Organic White Willow) Bark Extract, Sodium Chloride (Dead Sea Salt), Polysorbate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Essential Oil, Citric acid.

Directions

After cleansing, pour a small amount into the palm of the hands and press into the skin. With the 1 oz Seaweed Toner use spray mister to lightly coat the skin of the face.

entry.title: Activated Charcoal Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shamanuti
Type: Face Cleanser
Price: 10.00 - 36.00 (3 variants)

This unique cleanser utilizes the properties of activated charcoal to neutralize acidity and absorb impurities as well as gently exfoliate the skin with maple extract. This versatile product is beneficial for all skin types including sensitive or problem skin and is very effective as a treatment for reducing acne, rosacea and eczema. It also excellent as a shaving cream and deodorizing body wash.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Lavandula angustifolia (organic Lavender) Distillate, Anthemis Nobilis (Roman Chamomile) Distillate, Sodium Cocoamphaecetate, Decyl Glucoside, Aspalathus Linearis (Organic Rooibos) Tincture, Vaccinium Myrtillus (Organic Bilberry) Extact, Saccharum Officinarum (Organic Sugar Cane) Extact, Acer Saccharum (Organic Sugar Maple) Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Organic Orange) Peel Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon ) Peel Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Glucolactone, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Organic Cranberry) Extract, Vegetable Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Activated charcoal, Melalkeuca Alternifolia (Tea tree) Essential Oil, dl-Panthenol (pro-Vitamin B5), Dimethylaminoethanol (DMAE) Hydrogen Peroxide, Citric Acid.

Directions

As a daily cleanser, put a small amount in the palm of the hand, add just enough water to create a nice slip that you then work into the skin using gentle upward circles and strokes. Let set for a moment and rinse off with hands or a damp cloth.
